name: GroupLevinson Public Relations
description:
GroupLevinson, located in Philadelphia, PA, is a full service advertising, branding, public relations, social media and marketing communications agency that creates value for retail, manufacturing, real estate, life sciences and professional service businesses with campaigns that include publicity, public relations, brand strategy, social media, Website design, media buying, email & direct mail marketing, advertising, video production, SEO, Google Adwords, strategic planning and more.
The difference . . . other agencies may be creative as well, but usually in an isolated or disconnected way.  GroupLevinson has business acumen.  We enhance the connection between your business strategy and what really drives your plan and brand; as well as to what truly motivates customers and creates a ongoing bond with them.
